name: DB_2_PDO
short_description: db_2_pdo is a PHP class that allows developers to use Pear::DB along with PDO.  Currently, this is not available.  If you would like to use SQLITE3 and PHP5, you will need to use PDO, and if you've used PEAR::DB, you will need this class.
